title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not include an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

  • Chlorophyll captures/absorbs light (energy).

  • Chlorophyll receives electrons (from water)/receives electrons (from an electron transport chain)/transfers electrons (to an electron transport chain).

The response includes an acceptable description. Acceptable descriptions include the following.

  • Chlorophyll captures/absorbs light (energy).

  • Chlorophyll receives electrons (from water)/receives electrons (from an electron transport chain)/transfers electrons (to an electron transport chain).

title: Part B
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include the explanation that there is less/no NADP + MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A33@ to accept the electrons, so the electrons pass (instead) to the cyclic pathway/from ferredoxin to the cytochrome complex.

The response includes the explanation that there is less/no NADP + MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3A33@ to accept the electrons, so the electrons pass (instead) to the cyclic pathway/from ferredoxin to the cytochrome complex.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not include the prediction that the rate (of biomass accumulation)/biomass/it will be lower (in comparison with plants without the mutation).
The response includes the prediction that the rate (of biomass accumulation)/biomass/it will be lower (in comparison with plants without the mutation).
